s.text: Widowhood wins votes: Between 1916 and 1993, "84 percent of first-time female candidates for the House who were running to succeed their dead husbands won their races."
The cover story argues that Kofi Annan's success in Iraq marks his arrival as the first important U.N.

3) Democratic donor Nathan Landow, accused of trying to silence Willey's testimony against Clinton, may in fact have been the target of Willey's romantic advances--"an easy mark for a calculating gold digger."
